title: Busted Up (1986 Action) Punching back for what’s right

sources.title: Busted Up (1986 Action) Punching back for what’s right
sources.description:
Fight for survival, fight for family—no surrender.
Earl Byrd (Paul Coufos), a tough-as-nails fighter, steps into the ring to save his neighborhood gym from a shady developer, all while trying to patch things up with his ex Simone (Irene Cara) and reconnect with his daughter. But when the stakes get personal, Earl must throw his hardest punches—both in and out of the ring—to protect what matters most

Original title: Busted Up (1986) Also known as: Killing Streets

Director: Conrad E. Palmisano
Writer: Damian Lee

Main cast:
Paul Coufos - Earl Bird
Irene Cara - Simone
Stan Shaw - Angie
Tony Rosato - Irving Drayton
Frank Pellegrino - Nick Sevins

Genres: Action, Drama, Music, Sport
Release date: October 30, 1986 (Italy)
Filming location: Canada


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics
